results.title: Decentralise essential services
results.summary: An opinion piece advocating for the decentralization of essential services in Trinidad and Tobago to address urban congestion and regional disparity. It suggests creating regional service hubs to stimulate local economies and reduce environmental stress. The author criticizes the previous government's inaction and urges the current administration to prioritize decentralization for national equity. The Bible speaks to the wisdom of decentralization of power to prevent corruption.
